attributes.action: Change the law on dog theft from general theft to kidnap
attributes.additional_details:
Dogs are a lot of people’s babies. They are loved family members. Dog thieves are not worried about doing it because the repercussions aren’t great, a small fine. 
They should be punished for kidnap they are causing serious harm to pet owners.
attributes.background: Make the punishment greater for dog theft. From general theft to kidnap.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Make dog theft a specific criminal offence
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560216
